DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if probiotic bacteria have a beneficial effect on the colon cancer-associated microbiota and epigenetic alterations in colon cancer. Dietary supplementation consists of two ProBion Clinica tablets, yielding a daily dose of 1.4 x 10 ˄ 10 Bifidobacterium lactis Bl-04 (ATCC SD5219), 7x10 ˄ 9 Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM (ATCC 700396), and 0.63 g inulin.
DOC.brief_title: Using Probiotics to Reactivate Tumor Suppressor Genes in Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: At least one malignant tumor in the colon Study subjects with adenomas, or who received recent antibiotic therapy or consumed probiotics regularly were excluded.
